entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming partly cloudy late in the evening with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 then light after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
